Skillshare X Adobe Fresco
Skillshare is an online learning community with thousands of classes for creators, entrepreneurs, and curious people everywhere.

This fall, Skillshare teamed up with Adobe to create exclusive online classes showcasing the possibilities of Adobe Fresco, a brand-new drawing and painting app with revolutionary brush technology, available free to download on your iPad today.

Get two free months of Skillshare and check out new classes for the new Adobe Fresco app by going to http://Skillshare.com/creativepep2

 

STORYBLOCKS

If you need b-roll, after effects templates, or video motion background you gotta check out Storyblocks Video. Head to storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk to learn more about Storyblocks Video today.

itunes:title: 250 - How to Find Your Style
itunes:author: andy j pizza, andrew neyer
itunes:summary:
This is one of the questions I get more than any other, and yet I've never done an episode where we attacked it head on!

250 episodes into the show and I finally feel ready to tackle this monster of a topic!!

This episode has 6 practical things you can do to actively find your style ON PURPOSE!

There are 5 quick ideas in this show that might be exactly what you need to have a style breakthrough today.

HOWEVER... THE LAST idea in this episode I am particularly STOKED ABOUT. It comes from a recent experience building a style in a sort of vacuum and from this vantage point I noticed some style fundamentals that I'd never realized before!

CAN'T WAIT TO SHARE!!!
